name: zeroheight
headline: The DevOps platform for UX
description: UX teams are scaling exponentially, but in order to scale effectively, they need to be able to reuse each other’s work. The problem is that right now, UX designers and developers don’t know what’s been done before and they end up rebuilding the same things – over and over. zeroheight integrates with UX tools and allows teams to document their work, so that it can be reused and they can deliver UX faster.

founders.name: Jerome de Lafargue, Founder
founders.description:
Software Engineer with a lot of love for UX who wants to give UX teams the same quality of tools that devops engineers have for delivering UX efficiently.

I studied Computer Science at Imperial College in the UK and worked as an iOS/Android developer at Bloomberg for a few years where I met my co-founder Robin who worked in the devops team. We witnessed first-hand the gap between UX tools and devops when it comes to efficient delivery of UX and decided to try and do something about it :)

# The end-to-end design system management platform.
## Document. Deliver. Measure. Evolve.
[Book a demo](https://zeroheight.com/<https:/zeroheight.com/demo/>)
[Sign up for free](https://zeroheight.com/<https:/zeroheight.com/create/account>)
![](https://zeroheight-wordpress-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Group-8821.png)
## Trusted by these great companies and more
![](https://zeroheight-wordpress-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/logo-united.png)![](https://zeroheight-wordpress-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/logo-adobe.png)![](https://zeroheight-wordpress-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/logo-guardian.png)![](https://zeroheight-wordpress-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/logo-uber.png)![](https://zeroheight-wordpress-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/logo-ulta.png)![](https://zeroheight-wordpress-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/logo-eventbrite.png)
## Bring design andengineering together
Create a single source of truth for all aspects of your design system, bringing together the tools your teams already love, and automating the workflow from design to code so everything flows like a big ‘ol flowing thing.
  * In-built integrations with Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD, Storybook, GitHub and loads more…
  * Automated delivery from design to code via Design Tokens
  * Import live components from multiple common frameworks, including React and Angular, and render them natively in your docs


![](https://zeroheight-wordpress-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/home-001-2.png)
> “Building out the documentation requires no development resource, which means our teams can be much more efficient.”
![Compare the Market](https://zeroheight-wordpress-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/image-2-1.png)
**Jason McCarthy** Lead UX Designer
![](https://zeroheight-wordpress-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/home-002-2.png)
## Build and manage your design system – fast
Building and managing your design system documentation can feel like a daunting task. zeroheight provides you the tools to get your infrastructure up and running as fast as possible, so you can get back to building the next Uber for cats.
  * Ready-to-use templates to make sure your documentation has the right information architecture to get started
  * Easy-to-use editor with customizable blocks, that allow you to build your docs as quick as writing a document
  * Access to our in-house design system experts, and a thriving community that will give you the guidance to get your system to an A+ level


> “When you think about sustainability, the zeroheight approach is way smarter…and the benefit is all of the pages look the same. It’s very easy for me to update everything.”
![Sage](https://zeroheight-wordpress-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/image-60.png)
**Julien Vanere** Design System Director
## Collaboration and governance out of the box
A good design system is a system with governance built-in. We give you a helping hand by offering ways to gather feedback, streamline distribution and provide complimentary ribbons and bows to tie it all up with.
  * Version and manage your docs by creating releases for your design system
  * Gather feedback directly in the editor with our commenting and review features, as well as gathering feedback directly from your users
  * Manage multiple design systems within a central location, and sync elements across your styleguides


![](https://zeroheight-wordpress-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/home-003-2.png)
> “It gives us the same starting point and the same focus point in comparison to the old days when each time was designing differently…”
![Prudential](https://zeroheight-wordpress-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/image-61.png)
**Chris Alexander** Director of Experience Design

If you’re on the mailing list, you’ll be joining over 100k other folks who know about our upcoming product releases, webinars and conferences, and exclusive e-books and whitepapers to make you a better design systems professional.

### Mission
zeroheight is on a mission to revolutionize the design and development process by bridging the gap between UX designers and developers.
